extendedIngredients.name: bacon
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 pound sliced bacon, cooked and crumbled

extendedIngredients.name: tart shells
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 packages (1.9 ounces each) frozen miniature phyllo tart shells

recipes.title: Makeover Mini Bacon Quiches
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a small bowl, combine the first nine ingredients. Place tart shells on an ungreased baking sheet; fill each with two teaspoons mixture.                                                                                           Bake at 350° for 8-10 minutes or until filling is set and shells are lightly browned. Serve warm.                                        Yield: 2-1/2 dozen.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Makeover Mini Bacon Quiches in  Healthy CookingJune/July 2008, p12                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 appetizer equals 54 calories, 3 g fat (1 g saturated fat), 13 mg cholesterol, 77 mg sodium, 3 g carbohydrate, trace fiber, 3 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a small bowl, combine the first nine ingredients.
Place tart shells on an ungreased baking sheet; fill each with two teaspoons mixture.
Bake at 350° for 8-10 minutes or until filling is set and shells are lightly browned.
